code: export function selectionSort(array){var animations=[];selectionSortHelper(array,animations);return animations;}function selectionSortHelper(array,animations){for(var i=0;i<array.length-1;i++){var smallest=array[i];var smallestIdx=i;for(var j=i+1;j<array.length;j++){animations.push([smallestIdx,j]);animations.push([smallestIdx,j]);animations.push([0,array[0]]);animations.push([0,array[0]]);if(array[j]<smallest){smallest=array[j];smallestIdx=j;}}animations.push([i,smallestIdx]);animations.push([i,smallestIdx]);animations.push([i,smallest]);animations.push([smallestIdx,array[i]]);var temp=array[i];array[i]=smallest;array[smallestIdx]=temp;}}
